  15. ‌#define sizelstring(l)  (sizeof(union UTString) + ((l) + 1) * sizeof(char))
  16. ‌#define sizestring(s)        sizelstring((s)->len)

  18. ‌#define sizeludata(l)        (sizeof(union UUdata) + (l))
  19. ‌#define sizeudata(u)        sizeludata((u)->len)

  21. ‌#define luaS_newliteral(L, s)        (luaS_newlstr(L, "" s, \
  22.                                  (sizeof(s)/sizeof(char))-1))


  25. /*
  26. ** test whether a string is a reserved word
  27. */
  28. ‌#define isreserved(s)        ((s)->tt == LUA_TSHRSTR && (s)->extra > 0)


  31. /*
  32. ** equality for short strings, which are always internalized
  33. */
  34. ‌#define eqshrstr(a,b)        check_exp((a)->tt == LUA_TSHRSTR, (a) == (b))
